name: @tpmjs/tools-e2b
description: E2B cloud sandbox tools for AI code execution. Create sandboxes, run code in multiple languages, manage files, and control sandbox lifecycle.

env.name: E2B_API_KEY
env.description: API key for E2B authentication. Get yours at https://e2b.dev/dashboard

tools.name: createSandbox
tools.description: Create a new E2B cloud sandbox from a template with configurable resources and timeout.

tools.name: getSandbox
tools.description: Get details of an existing E2B sandbox by ID.

tools.name: listSandboxes
tools.description: List all running E2B sandboxes in your account.

tools.name: killSandbox
tools.description: Terminate a running E2B sandbox immediately.

tools.name: setTimeout
tools.description: Set or extend the timeout for an E2B sandbox.

tools.name: runCode
tools.description: Execute code in an E2B sandbox. Supports Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, R, Java, and Bash.

tools.name: runCommand
tools.description: Execute a shell command in an E2B sandbox.

tools.name: writeFile
tools.description: Write content to a file in the E2B sandbox filesystem.

tools.name: readFile
tools.description: Read content from a file in the E2B sandbox filesystem.

tools.name: listFiles
tools.description: List files and directories at a path in the E2B sandbox.

tools.name: uploadFile
tools.description: Upload a file to the E2B sandbox from base64 content or URL.

tools.name: downloadFile
tools.description: Download a file from the E2B sandbox as base64 content.

tools.name: makeDirectory
tools.description: Create a directory in the E2B sandbox filesystem.

tools.name: watchDirectory
tools.description: Watch a directory in the E2B sandbox for file changes.

tools.name: pauseSandbox
tools.description: Pause a running E2B sandbox to preserve state.

tools.name: resumeSandbox
tools.description: Resume a previously paused E2B sandbox.

tools.name: setEnvVars
tools.description: Set environment variables in an E2B sandbox.

tools.name: getMetrics
tools.description: Get resource usage metrics for an E2B sandbox.

tools.name: installPackages
tools.description: Install Python packages in an E2B Code Interpreter sandbox.
